creator: kirill@korins.ky
text:
Good day!

I tried to use last code from 2.2-HEAD and it responses '440 Bad Request' for any request.

I made some research and found that you forgot about move small commit to 2.2.x branch: https://github.com/apache/httpd/commit/be528b8731c7c71d0dccc71fb30193096732b669

This commit it is a bugfix for https://github.com/apache/httpd/commit/43f4074f13b320a10ee235174c2d30247bf63a41 that was added by https://github.com/apache/httpd/commit/27ca73eb51db6b34a1ee9d17ebb5330a576f880f
